entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:43 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: WSW 31 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
